name: Pi-hole
short_description: Network-wide ad blocking via DNS sinkhole. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Network-wide ad blocking via DNS sinkhole. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Pi-hole is a self-hosted application focused on network, security, dns, privacy. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Pi-hole on your home server to network-wide ad blocking via dns sinkhole. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Pi-hole to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
